title: Online Multicultural Integrated Language Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Language education course aiming to promote interaction among multicultural learners and strengthen intercultural communication competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more content design strategies that consider cultural backgrounds of multicultural learners in online settings.
Learners can apply concrete methods to reduce intercultural communication barriers through mobile-based microlearning activities to real-world cases.
Learners can implement and submit a multicultural integrated education design model through project-based assessment in actual educational scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
